author: sandersaares
body:
On the repo homepage, there are a set of MSI links but as far as I know, Nano Server does not support MSI.  Furthermore, the instructions page mentions "Full SKU" which gives me the impression it does not document installation on Nano Server.

Therefore, I request that instructions be added on how to install the latest version of PowerShell 6 onto Nano Server.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body:
The quick answer is to copy the win10 zip (PowerShell_6.0.0-alpha.15-win10-win2k16-x64.zip) to your Nano Server instance and unzip it.

I will update the install instructions with more detailed steps as well since Nano Server interaction is a little different from other SKUs.

title: Requesting Nano Server install instructions
